questions.title: 为什么她常常来这里？
questions.answer: Why does she often come here?

questions.title: 她常常来这里因为她喜欢这里（likes it）。
questions.answer: She often comes here because she likes it here.

questions.title: 为什么他总是去那里？
questions.answer: Why does he always go there?

questions.title: 他总是去那里因为他不喜欢来这里。
questions.answer: He always go there because he doesn’t like to come here.

questions.title: 我们今天何时学英文？
questions.answer: When do we learn English today?

questions.title: 为什么他现在是虚弱的？
我们今天在那里学英文。
